elements.text: You enroll in a class to learn a new language, a task that's been on your bucket list for years. You are surprised how hard you have to study to learn the new language, and you start to worry that your memory is getting worse. You ask your doctor about it, and their test shows that your memory and thinking abilities are the same as...

elements.name: Studying a New Language_Presymptomatic_puzzle1
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
